name: ghost-memory
effect: Held: Changes Silvally to its Ghost form. Changes Multi-Attack’s type to Ghost.
short_effect: Held: Changes Silvally to its Ghost form. Changes Multi-Attack’s type to Ghost.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A memory disc that contains Ghost-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A memory disc that contains Ghost-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A memory disc that contains Ghost-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.
